mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.token AS "token", a.state AS "state", a.created_on AS "createDate", a.updated_on AS "updateDate", a.type AS "type"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_uface_token a
AND a.type = #{type}
order by a.created_on desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_uface_token( id, token, state, created_on, updated_on, type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{token}, #{state}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{type} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_uface_token SET token = #{token}, state = #{state}, created_on = #{createDate}, updated_on = #{updateDate}, type = #{type} WHERE id = #{id}
